00032 XMLMessage::XMLMessage()
00033 {
00034         doc = NULL;

00037 XMLMessage::~XMLMessage()
00038 {
00039         if ( doc != NULL )
00040         {       
00041                 xmlFreeDoc(doc);
00042                 doc = NULL;
00043         }
00044 }

00046 XMLMessage::XMLMessage(const XMLMessage& msg)
00047 {
00048         if ( msg.doc )
00049         {
00050                 doc = xmlCopyDoc(msg.doc, 1 ); // 1 stands for recursive copy
00051         }
00052         else
00053         {
00054                 doc = NULL;
00055         }
00056         origine = msg.origine;
00057         pid = msg.pid;
00058         mid = msg.mid;
00059 }

00061 xmlNodePtr XMLMessage::GetRootNode()
00062 {
00063         if(doc) return xmlDocGetRootElement(doc);
00064         else return NULL;
00065 }

00067 void XMLMessage::Display(FILE* fout)
00068 {
00069         DisplayNode(GetRootNode(), fout);

00072 xmlAttrPtr XMLMessage::FindAttribute(const SimpleString name, xmlNodePtr node)
00073 {
00074         if(node)
00075         {
00076                 xmlAttrPtr current = node->properties;
00077                 while(current)
00078                 {
00079                         if( name == (const char*)current->name )
00080                         {
00081                                 return current;
00082                         }
00083                         current = current->next;
00084                 }
00085         }
00086         return NULL;
00087 }
00088 
00089 xmlNodePtr XMLMessage::FindFirstChild(const SimpleString name, xmlNodePtr node)
00090 {
00091         if(node)
00092         {
00093                 xmlNodePtr current = node->children;
00094                 while(current)
00095                 {
00096                         if( (current->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE) && (name == (const char*)current->name) )
00097                         {
00098                                 return current;
00099                         }
00100                         current = current->next;
00101                 }
00102         }
00103         return NULL;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void XMLMessage::DisplayNode(xmlNodePtr node, FILE* fout)
00107 {
00108         if(node)
00109         {
00110                 xmlNodePtr current = node->children;
00111                 if(current)
00112                 {
00113                         fprintf(fout, "<%s>\n", node->name);
00114                         while(current)
00115                         {
00116                                 if((current->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE)) 
00117                                         DisplayNode(current, fout);
00118                                 current = current->next;
00119                         }
00120                         fprintf(fout, "</%s>\n", node->name);
00121                 }
00122                 else fprintf(fout, "<%s/>\n", node->name);      
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 SimpleString XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(xmlNodePtr node)
00127 {
00128         SimpleString str;
00129         bool cdata = false;
00130 
00131         xmlNodePtr cur = node;
00132 
00133         for(; cur && !cdata; cur = cur->next)
00134         {
00135                 if(cur->type == XML_TEXT_NODE) 
00136                 {      
00137                         str += (const char*)cur->content;
00138                 }
00139                 else if(cur->type == XML_CDATA_SECTION_NODE)
00140                 {
00141                         str = (const char*)cur->content;
00142                         cdata = false;
00143                 }
00144         }
00145         return str;
00146 }

00173 void XMLTreeParser::Receive(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, MsgSocketCallBackData& cd)
00174 {
00175         xmlDocPtr doc = ParseMessage(cd.Msg.GetLength(), (unsigned char*)cd.Msg.GetBuffer());
00176         if( doc )
00177         {
00178                 XMLMessage* msg = new XMLMessage();
00179                 msg->doc = doc;
00180                 msg->origine = cd.Msg.GetOrigine();
00181                 msg->pid = cd.Msg.GetPeerId();
00182                 msg->mid = cd.Msg.GetMsgId();
00183                 PushMessage(msg);
00184         }
00185 }
00186 
00187 void XMLTreeParser::PushMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00188 {
00189         listXMLMsg.Lock();
00190         listXMLMsg.Add(msg); 
00191         event.Signal();
00192         event.Reset();
00193         listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00194 }
00195 
00196 int XMLTreeParser::ProcessMessages()
00197 {
00198         listXMLMsg.Lock();
00199         int nb = 0;
00200         XMLMessage* msg = NULL;
00201         for(listXMLMsg.First(); listXMLMsg.NotAtEnd(); listXMLMsg.Next())
00202         {
00203                 msg = listXMLMsg.GetCurrent();
00204                 try
00205                 {
00206                         ProcessAMessage(msg);
00207                 }
00208                 catch( SimpleException &e )
00209                 {
00210                         OmiscidTrace( "'%s' occurs when processing XML message : %s (%d)\n", e.GetExceptionType().GetStr(), e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00211                 }
00212                 delete msg;
00213                 listXMLMsg.RemoveCurrent();
00214                 nb++;
00215         }
00216         listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00217         return nb;
00218 }
00219 
00220 
00221 void XMLTreeParser::ProcessAMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00222 {
00223         OmiscidTrace( "XMLTreeParser::ProcessAMessage\n");
00224         msg->Display();
00225 }
00226 
00227 XMLMessage* XMLTreeParser::GetMessage()
00228 {
00229         XMLMessage* msg = NULL;
00230         listXMLMsg.Lock();
00231         if(listXMLMsg.GetNumberOfElements())
00232         { 
00233                 listXMLMsg.First();
00234                 msg = listXMLMsg.GetCurrent();
00235                 listXMLMsg.RemoveCurrent();
00236         }
00237         listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00238         return msg;
00239 }
00240 
00241 void XMLTreeParser::ClearMessages()
00242 {
00243         listXMLMsg.Lock();    
00244         for(listXMLMsg.First(); listXMLMsg.NotAtEnd(); listXMLMsg.Next())
00245         {
00246                 delete listXMLMsg.GetCurrent();
00247                 listXMLMsg.RemoveCurrent();
00248         }  
00249         listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00250 }
00251 
00252 unsigned int XMLTreeParser::GetNbMessages()
00253 {
00254         listXMLMsg.Lock();      
00255         int nb = listXMLMsg.GetNumberOfElements();
00256         listXMLMsg.Unlock();
00257         return nb;
00258 }

00260 bool XMLTreeParser::WaitForMessage(unsigned long timer)
00261 {  
00262         event.Reset();
00263         if(!HasMessages())
00264         {
00265                 return event.Wait(timer);
00266         }
00267         return true;
00268 }

00270 
00271 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE XMLTreeParser::Run()
00272 {
00273         while(!StopPending())
00274         {
00275                 try
00276                 {
00277                         if(WaitForMessage(10))
00278                         {
00279                                 ProcessMessages();
00280                         }
00281                 }
00282                 catch(SimpleException& e)
00283                 {
00284                         OmiscidTrace( "XMLTreeParser::Run: ExceptionRaisedFromDown (%s)\n", e.msg.GetStr() );
00285                 }
00286         }
00287 
00288         // OmiscidTrace( "ThreadWasAskedToDie\n" );
00289 }
00290 
00291 bool XMLTreeParser::HasMessages()
00292 {
00293         return GetNbMessages() != 0;
00294 }
